name.ja: <ruby>深<rt>しん</rt></ruby><ruby>淵<rt>えん</rt></ruby><ruby>竜<rt>りゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>神<rt>じん</rt></ruby>アビス・ポセイドラ

summoning_condition.en: You can Maximum Summon this card together with "Abyssal Dragon Lord Abyss Poseidra [L]" and "Abyssal Dragon Lord Abyss Poseidra [R]".

effect.en: If you have no monsters in your Graveyard, your opponent cannot activate Trap Cards when this card declares an attack, also if this card is in Maximum Mode, it cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects.
